title: Thunder laud effort of 'fearless' Williams in Game 5
content: Jalen Williams, a first-time All-Star in his third NBA season, rose to the occasion Monday night, powering the Thunder to a 120-109 win over the Pacers in Game 5 of the NBA Finals, an effort that helped give his club a 3-2 series lead.

title: Monahan to leave as PGA Tour commish in '26
content: The PGA Tour announced Tuesday that commissioner Jay Monahan will be stepping down at the end of his contract in 2026, as new CEO Brian Rolapp takes over day-to-day responsibilities.

title: Haliburton limited by calf: If I can walk, want to play
content: Pacers star Tyrese Haliburton was hampered by a sore right calf as Indiana dropped Game 5 at Oklahoma City on Monday night to fall behind 3-2 in the NBA Finals.

title: Ohtani hits 100 mph in brief Dodgers pitching debut
content: Shohei Ohtani made his Dodgers pitching debut at home Monday, giving up a run in his lone inning of work, then struck out in his first plate appearance as Los Angeles' DH, marking the first time he has pitched and hit in a game since Aug. 23, 2023.

title: Red Sox execs defend Devers deal, cite 'alignment'
content: A day after trading All-Star slugger Rafael Devers to the Giants, Red Sox president Sam Kennedy told reporters on Monday night that Devers' refusal to change positions made it untenable for him to remain with the team.

title: Dodgers' Pages: HBP from Cease was intentional
content: Andy Pages was fired up after the Dodgers CF was hit by a fastball from Padres starter Dylan Cease in the fourth, prompting a visit from both managers.

title: LeBron says focus is getting knee healthy by camp
content: As he prepares to return for his 23rd NBA season, Lakers superstar LeBron James said his priority is getting his left knee healthy in time for training camp.

title: Sabalenka to Gauff: Emotions got 'better of me'
content: Saying her emotions got "the better of me," Aryna Sabalenka said she wrote an apology to Coco Gauff for her "unprofessional" comments following her loss to Gauff at the French Open.

title: ðŸ“ˆ Ranking lineups for all 30 MLB teams
content: As MLB closes in on the halfway point of the season, we take a look at the hottest offenses so far -- from what makes them click to their biggest weakness.

title: New NBA mock draft for all 59 picks: Who's rising and what we're hearing throughout Round 1
content: With the draft eight days away, Jonathan Givony and Jeremy Woo share the latest intel from around the league.

title: Trade for a vet? What we know about the Spurs going into the draft
content: San Antonio strives to "build something that's sustainable," it has options, and we have three trade offers.

title: Favorites at The Open, J.J. Spaun's future and how Ryder Cup teams are shaping up
content: Who will be the favorites in The Open? Will J.J. Spaun's unlikely victory propel him to more wins? With the U.S. Open finished, we look ahead in the 2025 season.

title: How Fever, Dream or Storm could reach Commissioner's Cup final
content: The first losses of the season for the Lynx and Liberty have opened up the race to the in-season tournament final.

title: What Sunday's shocking trade means for the East, the KD saga and the NBA draft
content: The shocking deal has ramifications far beyond Orlando and Memphis -- including the Kevin Durant trade saga.

title: A wedding during the MCWS?! More than one ring is on the line for Louisville's Tanner Shiver
content: Louisville's Tanner Shiver is competing in the MCWS this week, but he's still planning on getting married Friday.

title: Inside Gage Wood's MCWS masterpiece
content: No hits, 119 pitches and one historic performance. Gage Wood was electric in his no-hitter for Arkansas.

title: 'We compromised the NBA Finals': How WCW capitalized on Rodman-Malone hoops rivalry
content: Marc Raimondi's excerpt from "Say Hello to the Bad Guys" looks at the nWo storyline involving two Hall of Famers.

title: The 7 MLB execs under the most pressure at the trade deadline
content: With the deadline on July 31, here are the front offices that could make or break their futures this trade season.

title: Grading the blockbuster stunner that sent Rafael Devers to the Giants
content: The Red Sox stunned the baseball world Sunday, trading their $313.5 million All-Star to San Francisco.

title: Texas State, cryptic posts and the Pac-12's next move
content: Texas State looms as the favorite to join the Pac-12. Why could that happen? What would come next? And what about Memphis?

title: A transfer window already opened and closed: What did it reveal about new tactics?
content: The first summer transfer window has opened and closed, and it has offered hints as to what Liverpool, Chelsea, Man United and others want to do differently.

title: Sources: Utd hold talks with Frankfurt's Ekitike
content: Manchester United have held exploratory talks with representatives of Eintracht Frankfurt striker Hugo Ekitike, sources have told ESPN, as they widen their search for attacking reinforcements.

title: Boca fans take over Hard Rock in Benfica draw
content: NicolÃ¡s Otamendi headed in the equalizer in the 84th minute to deliver Benfica a 2-2 draw against Boca Juniors in the teams' opening match of the Club World Cup that featured three red cards Monday in Miami Gardens, Florida.

title: Chelsea beat LAFC at Club WC as Delap debuts
content: Pedro Neto and Enzo FernÃ¡ndez each scored goals to propel Chelsea to a 2-0 victory over LAFC in the Group D opener for each team in the Club World Cup in Atlanta on Monday afternoon.

title: Boca blasts referee's PK call in Benfica comeback
content: Benfica overcame a two-goal deficit to secure a 2-2 draw against Boca Juniors on Monday night in a heated Club World Cup match, a contest marked by a controversial penalty call in favor of the Portuguese team.

title: Socceroos using MLS to prepare for World Cup
content: A trio of Socceroos who call MLS home are confident the league's rising standards will bolster their hopes of being part of the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

title: Maresca told Palmer to take 'initiative' for Chelsea
content: Enzo Maresca said he has challenged Cole Palmer to be more creative and "take initiative" after the England playmaker claimed he was "sick of going backwards or sideways" during the Conference League final in May.

title: 'It's impossible': Hot temps worry CWC players
content: Players and coaches competing at the Club World Cup have expressed concerns about the hot and humid conditions during the tournament.

title: Source: Bale joins group eyeing Plymouth sale
content: Former Real Madrid winger and Wales international Gareth Bale is involved with a United States private equity company discussing a potential takeover at Plymouth Argyle, a source has told ESPN.

title: USMNT eases pressure with big win to open Gold Cup, but tougher tests ahead
content: Sunday's big win should relieve some pressure on a U.S. team that's been struggling for form and harmony of late. However, it's clear bigger tests are ahead at this Gold Cup and beyond.

title: An 11-year NBA veteran and the emergency transplant that saved his life
content: Sixteen months ago, Scot Pollard was in active heart failure, about to die. Then came a lifesaving transplant, uniting two families -- and two fathers -- forever. Watch E60's "Heart of Pearl" at 1 p.m. ET on ESPN.

title: McLaren's Montreal miscues give F1 rivals hope for rest of 2025
content: Sunday's Canadian GP was the first podium in 2025 that didn't feature a McLaren. Is the tide about to turn on F1's runaway leader?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal enter race for Laporte
content: Arsenal are one of the clubs interested in signing former Manchester City defender Aymeric Laporte. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Debunking the 'Man United tax' myth
content: Transfer chiefs have complained for years, but it's on the club to stop paying over the odds for players.

title: 'Raja was taken by surprise': Police recreate Meghalaya crime scene
content: Meghalaya police have reconstructed the crime scene of the Raja Raghuvanshi murder case in Sohra, with the accused present. Investigations revealed Sonam's involvement and the roles of Vishal, Anand, and Akash in the murder. Authorities are still searching for a missing machete used in the crime, while Sonam confessed to damaging the victim's phone and being present during the murder.

title: Sibal calls Yashwant Varma 'one of the finest judges'; condemns impeachment move
content: Kapil Sibal defends Justice Yashwant Varma, calling him a fine judge and criticising the government's impeachment move following the discovery of a large sum of cash at his residence. Sibal alleges the government's true aim is to undermine the Collegium system and control judicial appointments, accusing them of selectively targeting Varma while protecting Justice Shekhar Yadav.

title: How the Ayatollah lost his 'axis of resistance'
content: The deaths werenâ€™t just symbolicâ€”they were surgical. The head of the Revolutionary Guards. The architect of Iranâ€™s missile programme. The chief of military intelligence. The coordinator of national defence. Gone. One by one, the core of Khameneiâ€™s advisory ring has been eliminated, shattering the command-and-control structure he built over three decades.

title: Nothing CEO reacts to Trumpâ€™s smartphone launch; says â€˜Weâ€™re cookedâ€™
content: The Trump Organization has entered the mobile market with Trump Mobile, launching the T1 Phone, priced at $499. Unveiled by Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump, the Android 15 device boasts a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, 50MP camera, and 5000mAh battery. Targeting customers seeking American-made products, the T1 Phone aims to capture a share of the U.S.

title: ITR: Do you need to file tax return if TDS has been deducted? Explained
content: ITR filing FY 2024-25: Indian taxpayers often wonder if filing an Income Tax Return (ITR) is necessary when Tax Deducted at Source (TDS) has been deducted. Experts clarify that filing an ITR is indeed mandatory, even with TDS deductions. TDS doesn't confirm overall tax liability, which might differ from the deducted amount.

title: IND vs ENG: 'I won't be able to play' - Jasprit Bumrah reveals why he declined Team India captaincy
content: Jasprit Bumrah, initially a frontrunner for India's Test captaincy, withdrew from consideration due to workload concerns. Despite being the vice-captain, Bumrah communicated to the BCCI his inability to play all matches in a five-Test series, prioritizing the team's stability. Shubman Gill was subsequently named captain for the England series, starting June 20 in Leeds.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Man collects 70 tolas of gold from site; used sarees to carry injured
content: A plane crashed at B J Medical College in Gandhinagar. Raju Patel, a businessman, rushed to the scene to help. He and his team assisted in rescuing the injured. They also collected valuables like gold jewellery and cash from the wreckage. These items were handed over to the authorities. The government will return the items to the victims' families

title: Boeing crisis: Elon Musk hints too many managers may be the issue
content: Following the Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner crash in Ahmedabad, which killed 241 passengers and crew, safety concerns have risen. A resurfaced tweet from Elon Musk criticizing Boeing's management has added fuel to the fire. The DGCA has ordered enhanced safety inspections for Air India's Dreamliner fleet.

title: 'Hung object on door': Raja's father claims Sonam believed in 'tantra-mantra', used black magic
content: The father of murdered Indore businessman Raja Raghuvanshi alleges his son's wife, Sonam, the prime suspect, practiced black magic and may have used it on Raja. Sonam, along with her alleged lover and accomplices, are in custody for Raja's murder during their Meghalaya honeymoon. The family reveals unsettling details about Sonam's behavior and beliefs following the tragic event.

title: IND vs ENG: Bold move! Ravi Shastri snubs Kuldeep Yadav, makes big call on Shubman Gillâ€™s batting spot for Headingley Test
content: Ravi Shastri has unveiled his preferred India XI for the first Test against England in Headingley, marking Shubman Gill's debut as captain. Shastri advocates for a top order that includes the likes of Yashasvi Jaiswal, KL Rahul and Sai Sudarshan. The former India coach has also included several other top names in his playing XI for the India Test.

title: 'We are scared': Indian students in Iran desperately await evacuation; 110 rescued
content: Amidst escalating conflict between Israel and Iran, Indian students in Tehran are living in fear, trapped in basements with limited communication. While over 100 students have been evacuated to Armenia, many others desperately await rescue, hoping for evacuation flights facilitated by diplomatic efforts. The Indian Embassy is providing assistance as families back home anxiously await news.

title: How China dodges US chip ban: Flying suitcases, renting servers abroad ....
content: Chinese firms are devising ingenious methods to circumvent US AI chip restrictions, including processing data abroad. Recently, engineers transported hard drives filled with data to Malaysia, utilizing Nvidia's advanced chips in a local data center to train an AI model. Southeast Asia is becoming a hub for these activities, with data centers rapidly expanding.

title: Why Iranâ€™s Fordow nuclear site is critical; how could Israel try to take it out?
content: Tensions escalate between Israel and Iran, spotlighting Iran's heavily fortified Fordow nuclear facility, crucial for uranium enrichment and potentially weaponizable. Built deep within a mountain, Fordow challenges Israeli military options, lacking the US-made bunker buster needed for destruction. Alternative strategies involve targeting power infrastructure or special forces, but risks of regional war and international fallout remain high.

title: Indiaâ€™s 1st bullet train project: Siemens to deploy ETCS Level 2 signalling
content: India's ambitious bullet train project connecting Ahmedabad and Mumbai progresses with a significant boost. A Siemens-led consortium secured a â‚¹4,100 crore contract from NHSRCL to implement advanced signalling and telecom systems.

title: Silver hits record Rs 1,07,425/kg on China demand, gold drops Rs 1,200/10g
content: Silver futures reached a record high, driven by strong global cues and optimism from China's retail data, while gold prices corrected due to profit-taking and easing tensions in West Asia. Silver is consolidating gains with potential to rise further, supported by geopolitical uncertainty and inflationary pressures. Gold prices fell as traders assessed the likelihood of a full-scale regional war.

title: Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce prove they're soulmates in every universe
content: Two orphaned cheetah cubs, Taylor and Travis, are rescued from illegal wildlife trade. They now thrive at a conservation center in Somaliland. The cubs have formed a strong bond. Staff at the center named them after Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce. The cheetahs are inseparable, often grooming and napping together. Their story highlights unexpected friendships and enduring love.

title: 'Shame on you': Pak's Asim Munir heckled outside Washington hotel during US visit
content: Pakistan's Army Chief General Asim Munir faced public protests during his Washington DC visit, with a heckler accusing him of human rights abuses. The incident, captured on video, highlighted diaspora anger over the crackdown on Imran Khan's supporters.

title: Kremlin 'agrees with Trump' over 'excluding Russia from G8 big mistake' remark
content: The Kremlin concurred with Donald Trump's assessment that Russia's 2014 expulsion from the G8 was an error, but downplayed the G8's current relevance to Russia. Trump criticized Obama and Trudeau for the removal, suggesting his presence then might have averted the Russia-Ukraine war.

title: Betting on gold! Central banks to keep buying gold in 2025; holdings to see big increase
content: Central banks worldwide are increasingly favouring gold amid global economic uncertainties, according to a World Gold Council survey. A significant 95% of reserve managers anticipate further growth in central bank gold reserves, the highest since 2019. Emerging markets drive this trend, prioritizing gold for its value preservation and performance during instability.

title: Will Khamenei meet Saddam Hussein's fate? Israel issues chilling warning
content: Israeli Defence Minister Israel Katz warned Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei could face a fate similar to Saddam Hussein, heightening tensions. This statement follows five days of escalating conflict, marked by missile fire and evacuations. President Trump has warned civilians to evacuate Tehran. Concerns are mounting over a potential wider regional war, despite Trump's claim that Iran still seeks a deal.

title: No Kohli, no Rohit? Doesn't matter â€” Team India still a threat
content: India is gearing up for a five-Test series against England, commencing on June 20th at Headingley, Leeds. Despite the absence of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, Graeme Swann believes India still possesses sufficient strength to challenge England. Jos Buttler anticipates Shubman Gill, the new Test captain, will blend the leadership styles of his predecessors while forging his own path.

title: 'Airspace unavailability': Air India Ahmedabad-London flight cancelled
content: An Air India flight AI-159 from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick got cancelled. The flight was scheduled to depart at 1 PM. Passengers were not given a reason for the cancellation. This cancellation occurred after the Air India Flight AI171 crash on June 12. The earlier crash resulted in many fatalities. The reason for cancellation is aircraft availability issue.

title: 'Future FIDE Prez:' Giri involved in an heated argument with Nepo, Nakamura - Watch
content: Anishâ€¯Giri publicly challenged WR Chess stars Nakamura and Nepomniachtchi over their successful appeal and controversial replay during the FIDE Blitz quarterfinals, questioning their motives. Nepo admitted the decision was messy, though WR Chess ultimately won the tournament.

title: Who was Ali Shadmani? Khamenei's close aide killed in Israeli strikes
content: Ali Shadmani, Iran's wartime chief of staff, was killed in an airstrike in Tehran, as confirmed by the Israel defense forces. This marks the second elimination of a top Iranian commander by Israel within five days, following the death of Shadmani's predecessor. Shadmani recently headed Iran's military emergency command, overseeing coordination between the army and the revolutionary guard.

title: Cardi B sparks outrage after posting photos of her children
content: Cardi B is navigating a new romance with Stefon Diggs and the aftermath of her split from Offset. Recently, she shared photos of her children, including her youngest, Blossom, leading to mixed reactions online. While some fans criticized her for posting the pictures, others defended her, celebrating her investment in her daughters.

title: 'Jija-jamai aayog': Tejashwi Yadav slams NDA's 'family politics' in Bihar
content: Tejashwi Yadav criticizes Nitish Kumar's government in Bihar. He alleges favoritism towards relatives of NDA leaders. Yadav sarcastically suggests commissions for sons-in-law and brothers-in-law. He questions PM Modi's silence on the issue during Bihar visits. Yadav also addresses unemployment and poverty in India. He says the government focuses on free rations but neglects jobs and healthcare.

title: In Numbers: England or Australia - where have India tasted more success?
content: India's Test cricket journey reveals contrasting fortunes in England and Australia. While early struggles marked their encounters in both nations, India achieved historic series wins in Australia in 2018-19 and 2020-21. Despite boasting legendary batsmen and bowlers, England remains a challenging frontier, with India seeking to end an 18-year series drought.

title: Cheer for passengers! Railways to roll out 50 Namo Bharat AC trains; 100 new MEMUs
content: Indian Railways is set to enhance short-distance travel by introducing 50 new Namo Bharat trains and 100 Mainline EMUs. Railway Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw announced these additions, with Namo Bharat trains, inspired by Vande Bharat, offering premium travel at speeds up to 130 kmph.

title: SpaceX launches 26 Starlink satellites into low Earth orbit from California
content: SpaceX successfully launched 26 more Starlink satellites into low Earth orbit from California, expanding its global broadband network. The Falcon 9 rocket, on its third flight, deployed the satellites as part of the Group 15-9 mission. The booster landed successfully on a droneship, ensuring its reuse for future launches, supporting SpaceX's goal of cost-effective space access.

title: DGCA summons urgent meeting with Air India and Air India Express officials
content: Following recent technical issues and a tragic crash in Ahmedabad, the DGCA convened an urgent meeting with Air India and AI Express executives. Chaired by DG Fazi Ahmed Kidwai, the virtual session addressed operational resilience, safety standards, and passenger service regulations. Key areas discussed included maintenance delays, airspace restrictions, passenger communication, and the status of Boeing 787 fleet inspections.

title: Honeymoon murder: Video from Double Decker trek captures Raja's killers; one tries to hide face
content: A tourist's video footage has become a key piece of evidence in the Raja Raghuvanshi murder case. The video, recorded on May 23 in Meghalaya, shows Raja and his wife, Sonam, on the Double Decker trek, along with the three men accused of his murder. Police confirmed the accused were ahead of the couple on the trail

title: Bengaluru stampede: BJP pounces on tragedies like vultures, says CM Siddaramaiah
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah has challenged the BJP to reveal instances of their leaders resigning after similar incidents, following a stampede near Chinnaswamy Stadium during an RCB victory parade. Accusing the BJP of exploiting tragedies for political gain, Siddaramaiah highlighted the suspension of police officers and the establishment of an investigation led by retired Justice John Michael Cunha.

title: Middle East on edge: Trump abruptly leaves G7; is a US strike on Iranâ€™s bomb-making facility coming?
content: President Trump abruptly left the G-7 summit amid escalating Middle East tensions, hinting at potential US involvement in an Israeli strike against Iran's nuclear program. This decision has sparked controversy, with some MAGA figures like Tucker Carlson and Marjorie Taylor Greene criticizing Trump for abandoning his "America First" policy and risking a wider conflict.

title: SC pulls up HC over Kamal Haasanâ€™s film; says 'mob can't be allowed to take to streets'
content: The Supreme Court intervened in the 'Thug Life' film controversy, overturning the Karnataka High Court's demand for Kamal Haasan to apologize for his remarks on the Kannada language. The apex court has now taken over all proceedings related to the film, directing the Karnataka government to ensure its smooth release.

title: IPL: Buttler compares Wankhede's atmosphere to Taylor Swift's concert
content: Jos Buttler likened the electrifying Wankhede Stadium atmosphere during IPL matches to a Taylor Swift concert, citing deafening crowd noise, especially when facing Bumrah. He also praised Shubman Gillâ€™s composed leadership and inner fire ahead of Indiaâ€™s Test series.

title: â€˜Watch out â€¦ â€™: Chinaâ€™s exports to US dip sharply; why India needs to be on the guard
content: Amidst trade tensions with the US, China has strategically shifted its export focus, increasing shipments to India, the EU, and ASEAN. While China's overall exports saw a moderate rise, exports to the US significantly declined, offset by growth in other markets.

title: 'I don't know how to play...': When Kohli's admission left Buttler stunned
content: Jos Buttler revealed how a candid chat with Virat Kohli during IPL 2023 helped him cope with pressure. Kohli's honest admission of self-doubt and advice on expectations gave Buttler new perspective on performance and mental resilience in elite cricket.

title: Kochi-Delhi IndiGo flight makes emergency landing in Nagpur after bomb threat
content: An IndiGo flight from Muscat to Delhi made an emergency landing in Nagpur. This happened after a bomb threat was reported. All passengers were safely taken off the plane. Security and bomb disposal teams are investigating. So far, nothing suspicious has been found. Authorities are checking the threat's source. The safety of everyone is the priority.

title: SSC GD Constable Result 2025 Soon: How to Download Scorecard, Key Info
content: The SSC is expected to release the SSC GD Constable Result 2025 by mid or late June on its official website, ssc.gov.in. The result, based on the CBT held from February 4 to 25, will list qualified candidatesâ€™ roll numbers along with cut-offs. Those shortlisted will proceed to PET, PST, medical examination, and document verification.

title: People scramble to flee Tehran; Iran's wartime chief of staff killed - 10 key developments
content: Tensions soar as Israel and Iran exchange missiles, prompting widespread evacuations and airspace closures across the Middle East. President Trump, after calling for the evacuation of Tehran, cut short his G7 appearance, signaling a hardline stance while paradoxically claiming Iran still seeks a nuclear deal. With civilian casualties rising and regional conflict escalating, the world watches anxiously.

title: Final goodbye: Father pays tribute to AI 171 pilot killed in Ahmedabad crash - video
content: Captain Sumeet Sabharwal's remains, a pilot in the Air India crash, arrived in Powai, Mumbai, amidst grieving family and friends. The June 12th crash near Ahmedabad claimed 241 lives, including crew and passengers, with DNA identification efforts underway. A London memorial service honored the victims, attended by dignitaries and diaspora members, while one survivor receives medical care.

title: Women's ODI rankings: Smriti Mandhana returns to top spot after five years; replaces Laura Wolvaardt
content: Indian cricket star Smriti Mandhana has reclaimed the top spot in the ICC Women's ODI Batting Rankings, surpassing Laura Wolvaardt. The South African batter's recent performance dip in the series against West Indies allowed Mandhana to regain her number one position with 727 rating points.

title: Tour operators meet J&K CM, discuss ways to promote tourism
content: The Indian Association of Tour Operators delegation meets CM Omar Abdullah and assured of safety, part of â€œRubaroo Jammu and Kashmirâ€ campaign

title: Telanganaâ€™s allegations on Godavari-Banakacherla project are politically motivated, says Andhra Pradesh Water Resources Minister Ramanaidu
content: The project aims at using only 200 tmc ft of the 3,000 tmc ft of floodwaters that go waste into the sea every year, he says, and asserts that as a lower riparian State, we are claiming what is rightfully ours

title: Cadastral map of the lake mentioned in MLAsâ€™ petition vanishes from the HMDA website
content: The lake in question is mentioned as Nanakram Kunta in Nanakramguda village of the Rangareddy district in the records of the Hyderabad Metropolitan Development Authority, with the lake id, 3712

title: Meghalaya â€˜honeymoon murderâ€™ case: Police recreate â€˜honeymoon murderâ€™ crime scene
content: Four of the five accused of murdering Indore businessman Raja Raghuvanshi were taken to the crime spot near the Weisawdong Falls in the Sohra area

title: Kerala Governor decries politicisation of campuses
content: Arlekar attributes political interference in academics as a key factor behind numerous students opting to leave the State to pursue education elsewhere

title: Free coaching in JEE, NEET to students in government junior colleges in Andhra Pradesh
content: As part of the move, students pursuing MBC and BiPC courses in 1,355 government junior colleges in the State will receive coaching and quality preparation material to prepare for national-level competitive exams

title: NHAI should ensure safe, smooth travel for motorists who pay toll, says Kerala HC
content: Petitions challenge continuation of toll collection at Paliyekkara, despite severe traffic snarl-ups in the Thrissur-Ernakulam corridor of National Highway 544

title: Rain is a nightmare for dwellers in Nagapattinamâ€™s tsunami quarters
content: Every year, hundreds of families living in the crumbling tenements across Nagapattinam district fear for their safety whenever there is a spell of intense rain

title: Nilambur bypoll campaign draws to a noisy close
content: In a closely contested battle where Left Democratic Front (LDF)â€˜s M. Swaraj and United Democratic Front (UDF)â€™s Aryadan Shoukath are front-runners, other key players like BJPâ€™s Mohan George, All India Trinamool Congress State convener P.V. Anvar, and Social Democratic Party of India (SDPI) Sadik Naduthodi are also vying for votes, adding to the electionâ€™s competitive landscape.

title: MHA to facilitate career progression of Agniveers after their retirement
content: A portal will also be launched to monitor the career prospects of Agniveers after they finish their four-year short-term service under Agnipath scheme

title: M.P. Cabinet approves promotion rules for staff after 9 years
content: After promotions are cleared, 2 lakh posts will become vacant in government services, and there is a possibility of fresh recruitment for these, says CM Mohan Yadav

title: Munich To Exploding Pagers: Some Of Mossad's Most Daring Operations
content: Ask any expert which they think the world's premier and most effective spy agency is and the odds are that Israel's Mossad will be in their top three.

title: NDTV Most Popular For News In India, TV And Digital: Reuters Institute Report
content: Consolidating its dominance in the news landscape, both online and on TV, NDTV has emerged at the top in a survey by the prestigious Reuters Institute at Oxford University.

title: "No Major Safety Concerns": Aviation Watchdog On 24 Air India Dreamliners
content: DGCA has said that the Boeing 787 Dreamliner, one of which crashed in Ahmedabad with 242 people on board, is compliant with safety standards.

title: Israel Has Struck Iran's Natanz Underground Nuclear Facility: UN Agency
content: Israel's precision strikes on one of Iran's most secretive and secure nuclear facilities - the Natanz nuclear complex, located deep underground, have hit the target, the UN's nuclear body said on Tuesday.

title: Man Beaten By Cow Vigilantes In Madhya Pradesh Dies, Another Critical
content: Mehgaon, a small town in Madhya Pradesh's Raisen district, is making headlines for a deeply distressing reason. Post-midnight on June 5, two young men were brutally assaulted by a mob over alleged cow smuggling, leading to the death of one and critic

title: 9-Year-Old Boy Slapped, Humiliated In Delhi Market, 3 Arrested: Cops
content: A nine-year-old boy was allegedly slapped, humiliated and verbally abused in public by a garment stall owner and his two employees in southwest Delhi's Sarojini Nagar market, police said on Tuesday.

title: "Ensure Not Even A Pebble Pricks Feet Of Devotees": Rekha Gupta On Kanwar Yatra
content: Chief Minister Rekha Gupta on Tuesday said that the Delhi government will set up a single-window system to grant permissions and handle grievances related to Kanwar camps during the holy month of Sawan.

title: Mossad Headquarters Hit In Tel Aviv, Claims Iran. Israel Denies
content: Iranian strikes allegedly struck strategic sites within Israel, including the Mossad headquarters in Tel Aviv and the military intelligence complex or AMAN in Glilot, several reports have claimed.

title: Calcutta High Court Pauses Bengal OBC Reservation Notifications
content: The Calcutta High Court on Tuesday ordered an interim stay on notifications issued by the West Bengal government with regard to reservations to 140 subsections under OBC-A and OBC-B categories made by it.

title: Gaza Health Care At "Breaking Point" As Fuel Runs Out: WHO
content: The World Health Organization on Tuesday pleaded for fuel to be allowed into Gaza to keep its remaining hospitals running, warning the Palestinian territory's health system was at "breaking point".

title: Iran's Khamenei Risks Fate "Similar" To Saddam Hussein, Warns Israel
content: Israeli Defence Minister Israel Katz warned Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on Tuesday he could suffer a fate "similar to" Iraqi president Saddam Hussein, who was toppled and later executed.

title: Air India Crash: 163 Victims Identified, 124 Bodies Handed Over To Families
content: Five days after an Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad claimed 270 lives, 163 victims have so far been identified through DNA matching and 124 bodies handed over to their families, officials said on Tuesday.

title: Taiwan Completes Sea Trial For 1st Indigenous Submarine In Big Defence Move
content: Taiwan completed the maiden sea trial for its first domestically developed submarine on Tuesday, a major step in a project aimed at strengthening deterrence against the Chinese navy and protecting vital sea lanes in the event of war.

title: Israel Will Continue To Do What's Within Its Capabilities: Envoy On Iran Conflict
content: Israel will continue to do what is within its capabilities to "degrade" Iran's nuclear programme, the country's ambassador to India, Reuven Azar, said on Tuesday, amid escalating tensions between the two countries.

title: All Amarnath Yatra Routes Declared 'No Fly Zones' Between July 1 And Aug 10
content: J&K administration on Tuesday declared all Amarnath Yatra routes as 'no fly zones' between July 1 and August 10 as a security measure to provide foolproof security to the upcoming Yatra.

title: Dreamliner Crash: Manipur Unites To Receive Remains Of 2 Flight Attendants At Imphal Airport
content: The bodies of Air India crew members 26-year-old Lamnunthem Singson and 20-year-old Kongbrailatpam Nganthoi Sharma from Manipur, who were killed in the plane crash in Ahmedabad on June 12, would be brought back to Imphal.

title: 17 Thane Buildings To Be Demolished, Top Court Says "Underworld Links"
content: The demolition of 17 properties in Maharashtra's Thane, ordered by the Bombay High Court will proceed.

title: "Becoming Norm With Air India": MP Supriya Sule's Flight Delayed By 3 Hours
content: Underscoring that travellers deserve better, MP Supriya Sule on Tuesday said her Delhi-Pune Air India flight was late by over three hours, and there has been no communication or assistance from the airline.

title: She Scouted Locked Delhi Homes, Used 50 Master Keys To Rob Them, Arrested
content: A 23-year-old former call centre employee, who turned to burglary, has been arrested for targeting locked houses in upscale areas of southwest Delhi using 50 master keys, an official said on Tuesday.

title: Modiâ€™s rule posing greater danger to democracy than Emergency, alleges CPI(M) leader RaghavuluÂ
content: Alleging an undeclared Emergency, where voice of dissent is stifled and foreign policy is driven by external influence, particularly the U.S., he appeals to democratic forces to come together to safeguard secularism, federalism, and constitutional values

title: Hemant Soren provides honorarium of â‚¹2.66 crore to martyred Constable Sunil Dhanâ€™s family
content: Dhan died after being seriously injured in an IED blast during an operation against Maoists in the forests of Ratamati village

title: A.P. govt. to announce circular economy policy in two months
content: The government will set up three Circular Economy Parks within a year, says Naidu and asks officials to ready a comprehensive plan with a focus on 11 sectors

title: Detailed project report for ERT project in twin cities to be submitted in two months
content: HESS India has signed an MoU with the State government for introducing Electric Rapid Transit (ERT) between Hubballi and Dharwad

title: Efforts to ensure better healthcare yielding positive results in Andhra Pradesh, says Health Minister Satya Kumar
content: In a report to Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu, he outlines the performance of the department in the last one year, and says that attendance, volume of outpatient and inpatient services, and public perception about government hospitals have vastly improved

title: Gavi reopens to tourists after brief shutdown
content: Workers suspend strike after they receive assurances that their concerns, including their pressing demand for safety gear such as raincoats and protective boots to prevent snakebites, and increased allowances, will be addressed.

title: ED summons D.K. Suresh in Aishwarya Gowda gold cheating case
content: Accused in the case allegedly falsely claimed to be the former MPâ€™s sister to cheat jewellers; Suresh terms summons â€˜absurdâ€™

title: 42 tribals, including 15 children fall ill after consuming puja food at temple
content: As of Tuesday, seven tribals have been discharged, 35 continue to receive treatment; health camp set up in the village to monitor the situation

title: Iran airspace closure: passengers experience flight delays, cancellations
content: Two Air India Express flights operating to Kerala were cancelled. Further, there were hours-long delay in the departure and arrival of many flights heading to and from the State to West Asian destinations

title: Government urged to ensure timely payment of salary to transferred teachers
content: Teachers, under no circumstances, should face any hardship due to procedural delay, say Navyandhra Teachers Association leaders

title: Minister urges NHAI to take steps to prevent road accidents on NH-67
content: NHAI official cites over-speeding and drunk driving as the basic reasons behind the accidents mentioned by the Minister, however says that a root cause analysis will be conducted to implement measures to prevent accidents

title: Kerala State Police Chief race turns contentious over delay in issuing Vigilance clearance
content: The alleged delay in issuing a Vigilance clearance certificate to Director General of Police (DGP) Yogesh Gupta, who is also in the fray, has raised eyebrows.

title: SFI meeting urges people to extend solidarity with Palestine
content: Daily life of Palestinians has been marked by constant restrictions, violence and oppression, and it is not merely a political or geographical issue, but a humanitarian crisis, says K.S. Lakshmana Rao

title: Andhra Pradesh liquor scam: YSRCP leader Chevireddy Bhaskar Reddy stopped at Bengaluru airport following lookout notice
content: A police team from the State has reportedly rushed to Bengaluru to bring him to SIT headquarters in Vijayawada

title: Government to set up chicken waste rendering plants as PPP model ones are beset with issues
content: Clean Kerala company, Kudumbashreeâ€™s Kerala Chicken and Suchitwa Mission will jointly operate them. In the first phase, plants will be opened in districts which currently do not have one

title: Totapuri inflows continue to flood pulp units in undivided Chittoor
content: Tirupati Collector S. Venkateswar advises the farmers to desist from panic harvesting and assures that every mango would be procured

title: Delhi High Court grants bail to AIIMS doctor accused of rape
content: Justice Shalinder Kaur, who was hearing the bail plea of the junior resident doctor, said the woman got more FIRs registered for similar offences against others and some cases, including that of extortion, were also filed against her.

title: Turmeric farming a new way to thwart wild animal threat in Munnar
content: Two acres of turmeric farming was conducted under the Munnar forest division last year and it reaped rich dividends

title: 102 arrested for pelting stones on trains, 33 for placing foreign materials on tracks
content: Such activities come under criminal offences and stern action will be taken against the accused under Section 153 of Railways Act, which could lead up to five years of prison time, says SCR Chief Public Relations Officer

title: Maharashtra announces toll exemption for Pandharpur pilgrimage vehicles
content: Waiver applies to palkhis, MSRTC buses, and warkari vehicles from June 18 to July 10; over 20 lakh devotees expected

title: Andhra Pradesh govt. gives cheque for â‚¹50 lakh and land documents to Army jawan Murali Naikâ€™s family
content: BC Welfare Minister Savitha visits the residence of the soldier who attained martyrdom during Operation Sindoor, and assures the governmentâ€™s full support to the family members

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Army strengthens coordination with former Chiefs of Army Staff
content: General Dwivedi welcomed the former Chiefs and underlined the importance of their continued engagement in shaping the ongoing transformation and future direction of Army, says Defence Ministry

title: Uniform midday meal menu for schools in Kerala
content: Microgreens and millets included in menu. Horsegram thoran, soya curry, drumstick leaf thoran, egg aviyal, paneer curry, egg fried rice, bhindi mappas among dishes

title: Release White Paper on funds allocated to KKRDB, BJP tells Congress govt.
content: BJP spokesperson Sudha Halkai urges State government to explain funds allocated and spent for the development of Kalyana Karnataka region

title: Controversy reignites over land use as plan to convert Aranmula Punja returnsÂ
content: Aranmula Anti-Airport Protest Committee up in arms against an electronics manufacturing cluster on ecologically fragile terrain.  It says, an airport project proposed by KGS Group has been shelved after it was discovered that nearly 90% of the 344-acre site consisted of wetlands

title: Woman tied to tree and beaten up over loan taken by husband in Kuppam of A.P.
content: The Chief Minister announces immediate assistance of â‚¹5 lakh to the victim; four people, including moneylender, have been arrested, says Chittoor SP

title: Technical snag in CMâ€™s helicopter: expert committee report in two months
content: The committee is tasked with studying the condition of the existing helicopter and recommend the model that can be purchased to replace it

title: Don't be surprised if ... these 19 things happen in 2025
content: if any of these thoughts come true for the 2025 season, don't be surprised . it's hard to believe that Erik Kramer boasts the franchise mark with 3,838 passing yards in 1995 . if we like Williams, then we really like Maye .

title: Ranking Elite 11 quarterbacks by system fit: Who could thrive at the next level
content: the elite 11 finals annually spotlight the nation's top high school quarterbacks . there's a clear trend emerging in Knoxville when it comes to quarterback traits in terms of stature, athleticism and arm strength . here are the top 10 committed quarterbacks attending the event later this month .

title: 2025 Fantasy Football Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this page will be updated throughout the summer, so please continue to check back for the latest content . this guide will serve as a one-stop shop for all of our best material as you prepare to make the best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in .

title: 'He definitely has an arm': Five things we know about J.J. McCarthy
content: the world has no shortage of opinions on quarterback J.J. McCarthy . he's not ready to lead the Vikings to super bowl lX in february . "they've really pushed the limits on just what I can handle," he says .

title: Are Real Madrid ready to begin the Xabi Alonso era at the Club World Cup?
content: new manager Xabi Alonso will play for real madrid in the world cup . he will play in the tournament on saturday . the image was dominated by the face of a new coach . it's been only a few weeks since the new coach's arrival .

title: Malik Tillman shines as USMNT secures a much-needed win
content: usmNT beat Trinidad and Tobago 5-0 at PayPal Park on sunday . the men's national team kicked off their 2025 gold cup run with a 5-0 win . Mauricio Pochettino and his men will now face saudi arabia on june 5 .

title: Panthers-Oilers Game 6 preview: Can the Oilers force a Game 7?
content: the Edmonton Oilers lead 3-2 in the 2025 Stanley Cup Final . if they win, they skate the Cup on home ice . the Oilers are now -400 favorites to win the Cup and the oilers are +300 .

title: Can Calvin Pickard backstop another Cup Final rally for the Oilers?
content: goaltender Calvin Pickard has helped save Edmonton from back-breaking deficits in this NHL postseason . pickard has forged a career excelling in secondary roles, the classic blue-collar contributor exemplifying work ethic and a straightforward mentality . he's just a normal guy, says kane, who's popular in his room .

title: NFL execs, scouts pick their favorite offseason moves: Where Rodgers, Pickens rate
content: twenty-eight teams are officially off for the summer, with the frenzied nature of transactions fading into the background . this week's minicamp is the ideal time to take stock of the splash moves around the league . a few potential moves remain on the radar, including a potential Jalen Ramsey trade .

title: Stanton to be regular DH, Cubs hope to have Tucker back
content: our fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . Aaron nola of the Philadelphia Phillies hadn't missed any starts due to injury since 2017 . he suffered a right ankle sprain in mid-May and had progressed to throwing bullpens in early June .

title: A former champion returns to form against ranked competition
content: two former welterweight champions turned back the clock with wins at UFC Fight Night from Atlanta this past weekend . Kamaru Usman moves up three spots to no. 6 in the rankings after showing the division he still knows how to wrestle . the loss snapped a six-fight winning streak for Buckley .

title: 2025 NBA Finals: Williams drops 40 to put Thunder one win away from title
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder dominated the majority of Game 1 of the NBA Finals . the Thunder led by as many as 18 points but held just a 95-93 edge after Pascal Siakam . but instead of letting the game slip away, Oklahoma City delivered its latest knockout blow .

title: Harry Kane leads Shapeshifters return in EA Sports FC 25
content: Shapeshifters is a new fan favorite for the program . the program features high overall ratings, meta-defining position changes and chemistry boosts . players getting special items as part of the program might benefit from new PlayStyles or Roles .

title: Impact of Devers trade on prospects
content: new San Francisco Giants 3B/DH Rafael Devers was the best player involved in the sport-shaking, Sunday night blockbuster trade with the Boston Red Sox . the 22-year-old outfield prospect is a smooth, left-handed slugger from Florida State with big power potential and excellent plate discipline . neither fans nor fantasy managers are likely to see Tibbs in the major leagues this season .

title: Shaquille O'Neal to join WWE 2K25 roster with Tyrese Haliburton
content: The next DLC pack for WWE 2K25 is just over a week away, and the second of the mystery NBA stars being added to the game has been revealed. Shaquille O'Neal will join  Tyrese Haliburton  in the "Dunk & Destruction Pack." Shaq has had a lot of involvement in the pro-wrestling world over the years. Back in 2016, he was a surprise competitor at WrestleMania 32's Andre the Giant Memorial Battle Royal, where his massive 7-foot-1 frame stood up to the equally huge Big Show. Then in 2021, Shaq turned to AEW, competing in a tag team match with the then-debuting Jade Cargill against company founder Cody Rhodes and Red Velvet. Alongside Shaq, Haliburton and the one NBA star yet to be announced, this DLC pack features The Great Khali, a former world champion in WWE, and Abyss, a former TNA wrestler who now works as a backstage producer for WWE. It is scheduled to release on June 25, 2025.
